attributes.action: Bring Back Capital Punishment to Britain 🇬🇧
attributes.additional_details: Bring back Capital Punishment and support victims and their families properly with the knowledge that justice has been served in it’s fullest capacity.
attributes.background: Is Evil entitled to taxpayers money to keep their lives?. A life lived in fear, is no life. Yet the evil in prison or outside continues to live in no fear at all and sleeps comfortably on the aid of taxpayers money. Please. Sign this petition and bring real justice to Britain via Capital Punishment

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:

Abolish whole life orders and reintroduce the death penalty
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700357
